entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 10:30 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
